mapper.insert: insert into setmeal(name, category_id, price, image, description, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, status) values (#{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{image}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{status})
